[{"id":"c8cdc5e5-c47c-42a6-bc8b-c2445ca17a15","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: visit_If","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1486571a-ac95-40b3-ba8e-2ed400c9eda4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_If","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function handles conditional logic in Python (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"elif","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). Static analysis of conditionals is complex because the code can take multiple paths. This function's job is to simulate branching: it creates separate analysis contexts for the "True" path (the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block) and the "False" path (the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block), records what happens in each, and then uses a helper (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mergeIfElse","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to combine the results into a single, probabilistic state.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"71b7995d-5441-41eb-aa64-9fbf5bc2ab1c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Variables in Python often change definition based on conditions.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"600747c9-ca95-45b6-aeb9-64e697424239","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = None
if condition:
    x = "Active"
else:
    x = 0","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ff5d67cf-2144-4079-9b68-25ebe15230aa","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"After this block runs, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is neither just a string nor just an integer—it is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"either","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" a string ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"or","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" an integer. Without this function, the analyzer might only see the last assignment (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x=0","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), leading to errors if later code assumes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a string. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_If","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" captures this duality.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a42c59c2-de7e-4f3f-aa14-e54d29f94ad2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d83a5ec0-fd1d-41df-a60e-42b9d9b547c9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Main Guard Detection:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It checks for the standard ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if __name__ == "__main__":","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block. If the current module is not the main entry point being analyzed, it skips this block entirely to avoid analyzing script-execution logic that won't run during import.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"57677e65-34a6-4e8b-aa31-6f1ddeef3900","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Creation (If):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"6ada5cf8-ae6d-4ded-bd4b-55f4b831a117","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It generates a unique name for the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<if_1>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1dffff8c-4306-46cb-852c-fabea42eba0f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a dedicated Scope and Definition for this block to isolate its internal variable changes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"0e804718-d524-4f48-9ff1-9c147a03d7aa","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Creation (Else):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"8570a48c-bcd2-4ec5-8672-168df552be5f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"elif","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") block exists (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"node.orelse","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it repeats the process: generating a unique name (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<else_1>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and creating a separate Scope/Definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e0d0e48c-377b-4bed-9202-9e004e210e0c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It records a "match" between the specific ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" scope and its corresponding ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"621ed388-8257-42c7-ac9c-6f6c1495988e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Traversal:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"0d7e6605-a8d8-4d5f-a338-e52fa6a93493","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It pushes the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" definition onto the stack (if it exists) to analyze the negative path.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e7dbc6fc-dcc6-44d3-a746-2cd51af51369","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It pushes the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" definition onto the stack to analyze the positive path.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f84ff218-2d9b-4c50-a347-715d7789d3e3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note: The actual traversal of the child nodes happens implicitly via the ","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":"pushStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method, which triggers the visitor on the node's body.","styles":{"italic":true}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"347f143a-86f2-4713-9ec6-9c3bf91f1c85","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Merging:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"0b34110f-ab8f-43df-acb3-d476123d2ea2","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Once the children are visited, it calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mergeIfElse","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This helper looks at the variable changes in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" scope and the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4f0b403d-818e-42ad-b09e-cca605162e88","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It combines them. If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" changed in both, the new definition of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" becomes the union of both possibilities.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"aa4f917d-c682-48ea-b90c-766bb9a7f3a8","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Update:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Finally, it commits these merged changes back to the parent scope via ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self.update","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2550f602-6248-463f-81ae-b0739084fddc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario

    user_id = "ADMIN_01"
else:
    user_id = ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user_id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" becomes a String.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0f2f2505-ffc4-4b3b-9657-d3cfad77216c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user_id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" becomes an Integer.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2a515a51-3cd0-44de-b0eb-d45040c3e711","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mergeIfElse","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6b77177c-28e9-4019-bf46-1792811dc20a","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The result is a definition for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user_id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that points to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"{String, Integer}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6b9c4546-f9fa-4962-a841-8237647ebfbf","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This combined definition is updated in the main function scope. Subsequent code treating ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user_id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as purely a number might now rightfully generate a warning.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f791ae2c-5d4c-490e-8e2c-377e09ed490a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
